note.p: Clergyman. BA, Christ’s College, Cambridge, 1830. Rector of Thorley, Isle of Wight, 1841–50. Admitted to Clapham Retreat lunatic asylum, April 1858.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/408/10/3/1), 1851 (HO107/1601/478/5)
Sutton, Surrey, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1538–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 June 2017)
UK, lunacy patients admission registers, 1846–1912 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 June 2017)
